title: "U.S. court will soon rule if AI can legally be an ‘inventor’"
excerpt: "Can artificial intelligence (AI) be legally listed as an inventor? After all, if AI can legally invent products, the number of patents on drug-discovery tools will shoot up fast. The issue is currently before a United States court."
